item.description:
Opening it up for anyone else who is interested.

http://www.3craceproductions.com/RacePages/ColtStatePark5K.htm

Rather than taking a team approach, I encourage anyone who is interested to register as an individual member. 

On the day of the race, let's try to meet up roughly an hour or two ahead of time.  I'll designate a place in the future as the event gets closer in time.

The Details ...

There isn't too much information to this race such as a starting point, bib pickup, or anything like that. Rather, this 5K I believe is just a simple, plain old fashion run. It's only $20 to register for the race, and note, the race is at 6:30 pm.
item.name: Colt State Park 5K
